resources.string: AFF Simply means Atmosphere For Favour. The primary aim is Lifting people from zero to hero via their gifts. Our vision includes: \n1. To Build gifted people’s empire where everyone can become a mega super star through his/her God’s giving gifts \n2. To enable people and ensure that people’s God’s giving gifts is blessing them and the world around them megally

1. You must make your career to be you (You must be possessed by the thing you do) 
2. What you’re doing is an intangible business 
3. Aff is a Gifted people’s Empire 
4. Aff is a Global Entertainment world that makes you a blessing around the world because your gift is your life 
6. Aff is a place of success and not a place of stress 
5. Aff is a helping house where anyone who comes in is helped 
7. Aff is a world where your God’s giving gift must shine out to your world 
8. Aff makes your life what it oughts to be

A.F.F Entertainment World International is a registered company with the primary objective of empowering talented people to fully develop their God's given talents in various areas of entertainment such as Music, Film/Movies, Dancing, Modelling, Script Writing, Comedy etc.

 
 Therefoe, if you are convinced within yourself that you have a talent that you want to pursue in your life, you are eligible to be part of A.F.F big project "Utilizing yoour potential".

 
 You are therefore obliged to obtain your membership form for NGN10000. This can be paid with three or two time installments whereby payment duration is within a month. You can even pay it once to speed up your effectiveness with A.F.F. as fast as possible and start participating fully in our programs. In case you wish to pay in through the bank. Acc. no- 0041095899 Diamond Bank Plc. Acc. Name: A.F.F Entertainment World Int. Ltd.

A fully registered member of A.F.F. is one who has picked interest form, agreeg with the rules and regulations guiding the company and has fulfilled the financial obligations of membership. 
 
 Entitlements: A registered member of A.F.F qualifies and stands the chance of engaging in A.F.F. activities such as; 
 a. Attending the general meetings of A.F.F 
 b. Being carried along in A.F.F. programs 
 c. Standing as an ambassador in any town, city and country where A.F.F. covers 
 d. Using A.F.F. properties e.g.Studio 
 e. Stand the chance of being promoted and empowered to acquire his/her God given gifts/talents. 
 f. Featuring in shows and other entertainment outfits organised by A.F.F.
